RDF-Ext : Starting

Published on 1970-01-01 by @danja

I reached a first little milestone with SPARQL GraphRAG, sparql.py for LlamaIndex in being able to get a demo running on a Colab notebook.

But I need to switch focus for a bit.

I'm about to start kicking the tyres/writing up RDF-Ext. It's a dev-friendly toolkit for using RDF in browser/node JS, bridging to the fairly opaque/formal RDFJS specs.

The Tutorial seems as good a place as any to start.
